description: This file contains global definitions, package metadata, and build instructions for the NIS (Network Information Service) packages, including variables for description, homepage, license, and a custom do_install function overriding the default build process.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Custom install function that calls 'oe_runmake' with specific flags to perform a sanitized 'install-strip' step, mitigating issues with the default install behavior.
